name: dyck_languages

samples.input: Complete the rest of the sequence, making sure that the parentheses are closed properly. Input: [ { [
Complete the rest of the sequence, making sure that the parentheses are closed properly. Input: < > ( ( [ [ ( { } ) [ < > ] ]

initial_prompt:
Correctly close a Dyck-n word.

Q: Complete the rest of the sequence, making sure that the parentheses are closed properly. Input: [ { [
A: ] } ]

Q: Complete the rest of the sequence, making sure that the parentheses are closed properly. Input: < > ( ( [ [ ( { } ) [ < > ] ]
A: ] ) )

Q: Complete the rest of the sequence, making sure that the parentheses are closed properly. Input: < [ < [ { < [ ] < { } > > } ] > { { ( ) } { < [ < > ] > }
A: } ] >
